jtxt.emulator

Class Cursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jtxt.emulator.Cursor

  • public class Cursor
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information about the current position to insert text into the Terminal.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Location location
      The current location of the cursor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cursor()
      Initializes a new Cursor with the line and position set to (0, 0).
      Cursor(int line, int pos)
      Constructs a new Cursor at the given line and position.
      Cursor(Location location)
      Constructs a Cursor at the given location.
